item.title: Frontiers in Intelligent Colonoscopy
item.description: This study advances intelligent colonoscopy by creating ColonINST, a large-scale multimodal dataset, and ColonGPT, a multimodal language model, to improve colonoscopic scene perception.

item.title: SpectroMotion: Dynamic 3D Reconstruction of Specular Scenes
item.description: SpectroMotion: a novel approach to reconstruct dynamic specular scenes by combining 3D Gaussian Splatting with physically-based rendering and deformation fields, outperforming existing methods in view…

item.title: 3DGS-Enhancer: Enhancing Unbounded 3D Gaussian Splatting with View-consistent 2D Diffusion Priors
item.description: 3DGS-Enhancer boosts 3D scene rendering from sparse views by cleverly using video diffusion priors to improve view consistency, resulting in superior quality and performance.

item.title: LLM-based Optimization of Compound AI Systems: A Survey
item.description: This survey reveals how Large Language Models (LLMs) efficiently optimize complex AI systems by acting as end-to-end optimizers, bypassing gradient calculations and generating intricate instructions.

item.title: EvoPress: Towards Optimal Dynamic Model Compression via Evolutionary Search
item.description: EvoPress: A new evolutionary search method achieves optimal dynamic LLM compression, surpassing current techniques in accuracy and efficiency across various compression methods.
